summary: Hey guys, for all you vamps out there that want a nice sturdy mutt by your side then look no further for Essential Blood Hounds for Dawnguard is here!
descriptionHtml:
The mod just changes the Death hounds Garmr and CuSith to \'essential\' meaning they wont die and will continue to serve by your side for as long as you wish, I did this because I felt that they needed to be set to that as they are cool lol.

Install - Add to skyrim/data 

This mod is also in progress with more stuff for the hounds so stick around or comment on ideas that you might want for them ;)

My Channel - www.youtube.com/tactividz
author: ElusiveCherry
